channel.title: Minecraft Seed Database
channel.description:
Wouldn't that be a pretty nifty idea? I believe one is already created, however it is not very large.
thoughts?
(this is for the single player seeds etc with world generation)

item.title: Minecraft Seed Database
item.dc:creator: @asyo4 asyo4
item.description:
@asyo4 wrote:

Moparisthebest:

What do you imagine something like this looking like? Or how would it function?

I’m not too sure, something like minecraftskins.com or something, i havent really planned it out yet lols.

Read full topic

item.title: Minecraft Seed Database
item.dc:creator: @whattehp406 whattehp406
item.description:
@whattehp406 wrote:

[quote=“Graham, post:15, topic:384334”][quote author=whattehp406 link=topic=480096.msg3516099#msg3516099 date=1299012725]

What always makes me laugh is that people seem to think almost every seed they’ve tried is cool or special. Perhaps you should instead realize that the Minecraft map generation is in general reasonably good at generating nice maps :p.

Also if you spawn in a crappy area and you explore far enough you’ll find somewhere decent eventually. Likewise if you spawn in a decent area you might explore and find a crappy area. Given the world is infinite, there is bound to be some decent places in it so idk why people make so much of a fuss about the map seeds.
[/quote]It’s always nice to have a cool spawn so you don’t have to walk/ride very far to get at your main base.

I’ve read that they plan on making it so you spawn where you last slept which I guess could improve that problem. Also, I believe there are some map editors that can change the spawn point.[/quote]Well that still haven’t happen but is a cool idea i would like to see added, and not everyone can/wants to use a 3rd party program.

but still you got a point

Read full topic

item.title: Minecraft Seed Database
item.dc:creator: @Graham Graham
item.description:
@Graham wrote:

[quote=“whattehp406, post:14, topic:384334”][quote author=Graham link=topic=480096.msg3516085#msg3516085 date=1299012372]
What always makes me laugh is that people seem to think almost every seed they’ve tried is cool or special. Perhaps you should instead realize that the Minecraft map generation is in general reasonably good at generating nice maps :p.

Also if you spawn in a crappy area and you explore far enough you’ll find somewhere decent eventually. Likewise if you spawn in a decent area you might explore and find a crappy area. Given the world is infinite, there is bound to be some decent places in it so idk why people make so much of a fuss about the map seeds.
[/quote]It’s always nice to have a cool spawn so you don’t have to walk/ride very far to get at your main base.[/quote]

I’ve read that they plan on making it so you spawn where you last slept which I guess could improve that problem. Also, I believe there are some map editors that can change the spawn point.

Read full topic

@Graham wrote:

What always makes me laugh is that people seem to think almost every seed they’ve tried is cool or special. Perhaps you should instead realize that the Minecraft map generation is in general reasonably good at generating nice maps :p.

Also if you spawn in a crappy area and you explore far enough you’ll find somewhere decent eventually. Likewise if you spawn in a decent area you might explore and find a crappy area. Given the world is infinite, there is bound to be some decent places in it so idk why people make so much of a fuss about the map seeds.

item.title: Minecraft Seed Database
item.dc:creator: @shrogg shrogg
item.description:
@shrogg wrote:

what if you decrypt the method of getting the seeds to the map style, so you can have a page that has lots of check boxes, then from what you press, it generates a map from that?

Read full topic

item.title: Minecraft Seed Database
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

[quote=“CoonHunter, post:6, topic:384334”][quote author=Moparisthebest link=topic=480096.msg3514727#msg3514727 date=1298871326]
What do you imagine something like this looking like? Or how would it function?
[/quote]
By god if you are actually considering this, read this suggestion. Categories sorting in the style (EX: mountainous, delta (flatlands), etc), and whether its in snow or not. Screenshots area within the post for like 2-3 pictures. I would not, however, suggest a uploading area for the world at all, but just have the seed listed near the top or something.[/quote]

There wouldn’t be a need to upload the world, that’s the whole point of seeds basically. So they would need to input screenshots (coordinates with each of them?), radio buttons to choose the ‘style’ (or check boxes, would there need to be multiple choices or just one?), and a place they could write a paragraph in describing the map. Then maybe a search option that would search for seeds and/or the description area?

Read full topic

item.title: Minecraft Seed Database
item.dc:creator: @Svitkona Svitkona
item.description:
@Svitkona wrote:

[quote=“Fat Cookies, post:8, topic:384334”]http://www.reddit.com/r/minecraftseeds

I’d say that’s good enough, I mean you can judge the epicness of a seed by simply checking how many upvotes it has![/quote]
Oh, nice. There are some pretty good ones.

Read full topic

item.title: Minecraft Seed Database
item.dc:creator: @xryz xryz
item.description:
@xryz wrote:

I used xryz as my seed and I started at imo a pretty good place. U should try. The first time I spawned at a island of sand with land not far away. Coal was easy to find. Plenty of wood. Its pretty nice. I actually first thought it was going to suck. Ppl should try their names and shee what they get.

Read full topic

item.title: Minecraft Seed Database
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:

Moparisthebest:

What do you imagine something like this looking like? Or how would it function?

By god if you are actually considering this, read this suggestion. Categories sorting in the style (EX: mountainous, delta (flatlands), etc), and whether its in snow or not. Screenshots area within the post for like 2-3 pictures. I would not, however, suggest a uploading area for the world at all, but just have the seed listed near the top or something.

thoughts?
